posts.post_content: N172 Old Judge Darby O'Brien (pose 351-1) $400.00 delivered. Check or money order only-no electronic payments. New York residents must add sales tax. As always, "I'll take it" supersedes negotiations, requests for more information or additional scans. Please confirm via email at edhans@monkberry,com. No PMs, please. Larger pictures and other examples are on my newly updated website below. Thank you for looking.
